item.description:
I am a young mom of 4 who would love to meet other Jewish moms and dads.The goal of this group is to give each of us a chance to interact and socialize with other parents who have the same interests and goals. this program will incorporate,songs, art,dance,movement,play time,exercise,mommy yoga,baby massage,parenting tips, stories and various sensory stimulations, the goal of our program is to deepen our relationships with our babies and toddlers and simultaneously instill a love and pride for Torah and Mitzvot within our childrenâ€™s hearts. A healthy snack is also included.
Commitment for the entire session is preferable, but you are welcome to attend according to the week if that is what your schedule allows.

group.name: mommy and me with a Jewish twist

item.name: mommy and me with a Jewish twist Meetup
